column3: School of Arts and Creative Technologies
column5: Explore your interactive media interests within a research context, guided by an expert within the field.Unleash your creativity and innovation within a research context, guided by an expert within the field with the MA/MSc Interactive Media by research.For the MA by Research in Interactive Media, you will investigate, through critical theory, close reading or other appropriate approaches, an area of interactive media and/or digital culture (such as games studies, digital cinema, digital identity, digital design and digital storytelling), submitting for your degree a thesis of between 15,000 and 20,000 words.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
